name: Treble Champions II
description: Treble Champions II is a managerial simulation in which the player takes over a team in the fifth UK division. The goal is to become successful in the Premier League in the long run. In comparison to the Treble Champions the options, previously restricted to training, lineup and transfer market, were expanded: now the player also may change the ticket prices, expand the stadium, borrow money from the bank and set up friendly matches before the season, Every athlete has a number of stats. There is no match presentation except a statistics field which gets updated over time.

shot.caption: Selection of skill level and creation of team
This is the main menu. You cannot use the mouse. Everything is keyboard controlled.
Maybe a friendly match makes my team better
This week's friendly games. We picked Liverpool
This is the game view. Minutes are ticking upwards and once in a while a text message pops up with "Shot" or "Goal". This minute we got a goal against us.
Lost the friendly against Liverpool and the finances are also not looking very promising
